sqlQuery.name: AllResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$genomic_answer$$ c

sqlQuery.name: ApiGenomics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$genomic_answer$$ c, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p ga where ga.source_id = c.source_id and ga.organism like $$organism$$

sqlQuery.name: ApiProjectSequences
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$genomic_answer$$ c, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p ga where ga.source_id = c.source_id and ga.project_id = $$Project$$

sqlQuery.name: SequenceTypes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$genomic_answer$$ c, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa, sres.OntologyTerm so where sa.source_id = c.source_id and ((sa.so_id = so.source_id and so.name = $$sequence_type$$) or ($$sequence_type$$ = 'all' and so.name in ('chromosome','contig','apicoplast_chromosome', 'mitochondrial_chromosome','supercontig', 'maxicircle','kinetoplast')))

sqlQuery.name: AllSequenceRecords
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id, sa.project_id FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa
